arts.ttl: Kane scores in comfortable Bayern victory over winless Slovan Bratislava
arts.sum: Watch highlights as goals from Thomas Muller, Harry Kane and Kingsley Coman lead Bayern Munich to a comfortable 3-1 victory against winless Slovan Bratislava in the Champions League.

arts.ttl: Champions League knockout draw: Date, possible fixtures, format, bracket
arts.sum: The draw for the knockout playoff round of the new-look UEFA Champions League is upon us. Here's when it takes place and how it works.

arts.ttl: Who Are Manchester City Playing in the Champions League Knockout Stage?
arts.sum: Manchester City avoided a catastrophic early exit from the Champions League and defeated Club Brugge to advance to the playoff round of the competition.

arts.ttl: Bayern see off Slovan Bratislava in unspectacular fashion
arts.sum: Bayern Munich concluded the league phase of the Champions League with a 3-1 win over Slovan Bratislava. As the win wasn't enough to get them into the top eight, the Bavarians will now go into the playoffs for the knockout phase.

arts.ttl: Confirmed lineups: Bayern Munich vs. Slovan Bratislava
arts.sum: The lineups for Wednesday's Champions League clash between Bayern Munich and Slovan Bratislava have been announced.
